code: var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{key:0,index:0,htmlIndex:0,id:"",word:"",width:0,left:0,top:0};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"NEXT_WORD":return loadWord(state,action.payload.testWordsArray,"NEXT");case"CONFIRM_WORD":return loadWord(action.payload.currentWord,action.payload.testWordsArray,"CONFIRM");case"PREVIOUS_WORD":return loadWord(state,action.payload.testWordsArray,"PREVIOUS");case"FIRST_WORD":return loadWord(state,action.payload.testWordsArray,"FIRST");case"RESET_WORD":return{key:0,index:0,id:"",word:"",width:0,left:0};default:return state;}};export default reducer;function loadWord(prevState,testWordsArray,type){switch(type){case"CONFIRM":return{key:prevState.key,index:prevState.index,htmlIndex:prevState.htmlIndex,id:prevState.id,word:prevState.word,width:document.getElementById(prevState.id).offsetWidth,left:document.getElementById(prevState.id).offsetLeft-document.getElementById(prevState.id).parentElement.offsetLeft,top:document.getElementById(prevState.id).offsetTop-document.getElementById(prevState.id).parentElement.offsetTop};case"NEXT":return{key:prevState.key+1,index:prevState.index+1,htmlIndex:prevState.htmlIndex+2,id:"word-".concat(prevState.key+1),word:testWordsArray[prevState.key],width:document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key+1)).offsetWidth,left:document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key+1)).offsetLeft-document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key+1)).parentElement.offsetLeft,top:document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key+1)).offsetTop-document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key+1)).parentElement.offsetTop};case"PREVIOUS":return{key:prevState.key-1,index:prevState.index-1,htmlIndex:prevState.htmlIndex-2,id:"word-".concat(prevState.key-1),word:testWordsArray[prevState.key-2],width:document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key-1)).offsetWidth,left:document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key-1)).offsetLeft-document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key-1)).parentElement.offsetLeft,top:document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key-1)).offsetTop-document.getElementById("word-".concat(prevState.key-1)).parentElement.offsetTop};case"FIRST":return{key:1,index:0,htmlIndex:0,id:"word-1",word:testWordsArray[0],width:document.getElementById("word-1").offsetWidth,left:document.getElementById("word-1").offsetLeft-document.getElementById("word-1").parentElement.offsetLeft,top:document.getElementById("word-1").offsetTop-document.getElementById("word-1").parentElement.offsetTop};default:return prevState;}}
